Room.Name: The muddy sewer
Room.Description: You are standing in mud to your knees. This is not the kind of place for a picnic. The muddy sewer stretches further into the south.

Exit.Description: You see the muddy sewer continuing into the darkness to the south.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

Room.Name: The muddy sewer junction
Room.Description: The muddy sewer stretches into the dark to the south. It looks as if no person has ever sat his foot here before. It's too muddy for that anyway. The sewer leads north, south and east from here.

Exit.Description: The muddy sewer stretches into the dark to the north.
East. The muddy sewer leads into a bend that goes south.
South. The muddy sewer ends in a mudhole that way.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

Room.Name: The mudhole
Room.Description: You stand in mud all the way up to your thighs and it's not too comfortable since you are used to a somewhat different environment. The sewer leads to the north of here. In the middle you can just make out an enormous drainpipe leading down.

Exit.Description: North. The muddy junction lies in that direction.
The muddy drainpipe leads down through the mud, otherwise it is utterly dark.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

Room.Name: The Dark Pit
Room.Description: You are standing by the edge of a dark pit that leads down into even deeper darkness. >BWWAAADDRR< - The smell from down there is unbearable. The sewer stretches into the darkness to the east.

Exit.Description: East. The sewer leads into the sewer junction.
The Dark Pit leads down and down and down ... well you can't see the bottom anyway. There are bars that function as a ladder on the side.

Room.Name: The muddy sewer
Room.Description: You are standing in the middle of a bend of the sewer pipe. It is very dark around here and the mud is sticking to your legs, not very pleasant. The pipe leads east and south from here.

Exit.Description: East. The mud stretches on into the darkness.
South. There is even more mud in that direction than where you are now. Incredible.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

Room.Name: The muddy sewer
Room.Description: You are standing in something that reminds you very much of porridge, this has the advantage that it's not hot, it's rather cold actually. The pipe bends to the north and east.

Exit.Description: The muddy sewer pipe leads into a bend that goes east.
The pipe leads into a bend that goes south. Interesting, there's mud on the floor there.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

Room.Name: The muddy sewer bend
Room.Description: This isn't your idea of a place to stay too long. You're in up to your knees in something that resembles mud, but you're not quite sure. The bend in which you stand leads west and south.

Exit.Description: The pipe leads into a intersection that goes south and east. The floor here is still covered in mud.
The pipe (still filled with mud) leads into a intersection that goes north and south. Interesting.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

Room.Name: A muddy intersection
Room.Description: You have both your feet safely stuck in mud. It isn't the mud that's wrong it's the smell, the sounds, the total darkness that surrounds you. Everything here is so depressing. The pipe leads on with a trail of thick mud to the north, east and south.

Exit.Description: North. The pipe goes into a bend with a load of mud all the way up the walls. The bend leads west.
East. This way like a place for the annual mud festival, although the stench wouldn't allow any happiness at all. The pipe leads into a bend that leads north.
South. There's less mud in that direction. *smile*. Your light doesn't cover enough space for you to see much more than that it leads into some sort of junction.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

Room.Name: The Sewer Junction
Room.Description: You stand in the middle of a huge junction of sewer pipes right under what you'd think was an air shaft. The sewer pipes lead to the north, south, east and west. It look quite impossible to force your way up.

Exit.Description: North. Mud is the floor basis in that direction. Yummy.
YYEEUUCH! BOOH! THAT looks like a nice place for creepy crawlies.
North. This direction looks quite nice actually. The pipe leads into a bend that goes east.
A few yards ahead - away from this junction - there is a pit leading down, but the smell from there...>PHEWW<.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

Room.Name: A bend in sewer pipe
Room.Description: You are in a bend in the sewer pipe. A strong smell seeps in from the north. The sewer goes north and east.

Exit.Description: North. You are staring into a huge junction with exits in all directions.
East. The Pipe leads into utter darkness that way.

Room.Name: The muddy sewer pipe
Room.Description: You have entered a kind of tube intersection that leads south, west and east. Your legs are covered in mud up to the knees. REAL yucky!

Exit.Description: East. There's less mud in that direction, or that's your impression.
That way is lost in darkness, though you sense less mud in that direction, perhaps even a complete end to this sludge that surrounds you.
West. The mud reaches that way too, all the way up the walls.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

Room.Name: The bend in the Muddy sewer
Room.Description: This is not your idea of a holiday. You stand in mud up to your knees. It's absolutely inconceivable how all this mud could have been placed here. The pipe leads to the west and south.

Exit.Description: South. There's even more mud that way, incredible! Although it looks like an intersection in the sewer system that leads east and south.
West. All you can see, is that the pipe leads into a bend that goes north. But there's less mud in that direction, however odd that sounds.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

Room.Name: A MUDDY intersection
Room.Description: You wouldn't want to know the true feeling of standing in this mud up to your hips. >BWAADR<. All that fills your mind right now is the dream of a hot bath. This is NOT very clean mud you know, remember you're in the sewer! The pipes leads north, south and east.

Exit.Description: North. Sludge and sediment fills this corridor of the sewer that leads into a bend going west.
East. You can see absolutely nothing of interest in that direction (Maybe that's why it's so damn interesting.??) There's no mud in that direction either, GREAT!
South. All you can see is more mud! Although the pipe goes into a bend leading west.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
It's NOT the kind of matter that would concern you too much, normally, but as you are in the middle of it, it just might become your main concern. REAL YUCKY!

Room.Name: Muddy sewer
Room.Description: You stand in a bend of the pipe system of the sewer with mud up to your thighs. Contemplating a higher level of existence here would be utterly inappropriate, as the smell would keep any intelligent creature from even thinking of anything but getting away from this foul end of the WORLD. The bend goes from north to west.

Exit.Description: North. Filled with mud, that place looks like an impassable intersection with pipes leading north and east.
West. There's less mud that way, maybe you're on your way out of this foul place.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

Room.Name: The old well
Room.Description: You are standing by an old and worn well from before this century. The sewer leads to the east from here and the well leads down into darkness. Metal bars implanted in the side of the well lead down as a ladder.

Exit.Description: East. You see, because of the utter darkness that surround you, absolutely nothing. Your light isn't of much use for that kind of distance.
Down the well there's even less light than up here, so ... sorry, you can't see a thing. There are metal bars in the side leading down into the darkness.

ExtraDescription.Description: These look like they're pretty slippery, and not very safe, but perhaps safe enough for you to climb down, WITH both hands on them.

Room.Name: The ordinary bend
Room.Description: You are in the middle of a bend in the pipe system of the sewer system, WHAT a place!!! The pipe leads to the south and the east.

Exit.Description: East. What a quiet place you've found there. It's an intersection that have pipeways going north and east.
South. You see nothing at all in that direction it's too dark anyway.

Room.Name: The sewer junction
Room.Description: You are in a junction that leads north, west and south.

Exit.Description: North. You see a bend.
South. It looks like a pipe junction just like this one. Only that one leads east and west.
West. There's a junction with four pipelines in that direction.

Room.Name: The ordinary junction
Room.Description: This looks like an ordinary junction, actually it seems very quiet here. The pipelines lead west, east and north.

Exit.Description: To the north you can see a junction like this one, leading north and west.
To the east there's nothing of particular interest, though there's a junction with pipelines leading north and east.
There's a bend to the west leading north.

Room.Name: A quiet pipe junction
Room.Description: This is the kind of place to rest, though the smell could be a LOT better than this. The sewer goes east, north and west from here.

Exit.Description: In that direction, you can't see anything. It's just too dark.
There's an ordinary junction in the pipe system to the east
West. There's an ordinary bend leading south into the sewer system in that direction.

Room.Name: The odd room with smooth walls
Room.Description: As you enter you hear a loud click from one of the walls ... and you fall and fall and fall ... . . . . ... And come to an abrupt end. THIS is strange indeed. There's an arched entryway leading down.

Exit.Description: Down. It's utterly dark that way, though you can make out an intersection of sewer pipes leading west, north and east.

Room.Name: The sewer
Room.Description: You are standing in mud up to your ankles. This is an intersection with sewer pipes leading east, south and west.

Exit.Description: To the east there's a peculiar looking round room.
To the south there's another intersection with pipes going south and east.
To the west there's another intersection like this one, with sewer pipes leading south and west.

Room.Name: Another intersection
Room.Description: You have never seen anything so BORING...This is an intersection with pipes leading north, south and east.

Exit.Description: To the north there's an intersection, where the pipes are leading west and east. You notice that the floor to the west is covered in mud.
East. You see nothing of interest in that direction, just another intersection. This one leads east and south.
Another intersection lies to the south. It leads west and south.

Room.Name: A junction
Room.Description: This one seems interesting, a big difference from all the other junctions. It seems cleaner than the rest of them. Weird. Something that looks like an air shaft leads upwards, but it looks far too slippery to climb. The pipes lead to the south, west and north.

Exit.Description: North. You see an intersection there, leading north and east.
To the south there's ANOTHER junction leading west and east.
To the west you see a load of mud and sediment in the sewer. That should be an intersection there but you're not quite sure.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.

Room.Name: The sewer junction
Room.Description: You stand in a junction of sewer pipes leading north, east and west.

Exit.Description: To the east you can see a bend in the pipe going south.
To the west you can just make out an old well.

Room.Name: The Triple Junction
Room.Description: You stand in the middle of a huge junction of concrete sewer pipes. The pipes lead into three different directions : east, south and west.

Exit.Description: East. You can see a bend in the sewer pipe leading north.
To the south there's a ENORMOUS quadruple sewer junction, all lit up by an odd light.
To the west you can just make out another junction similar to the one you are standing in.

Room.Name: The Quadruple Junction Under the Dump
Room.Description: You are standing in something that reminds you of an entry to an ant hive. There are enormous concrete pipes leading north, south, east and west. There's also a metal ladder built into the concrete wall leading up through a layer of garbage.

Exit.Description: To the north you can see a huge triple junction with sewer pipes leading west and east.
East. You can see a pit in the floor.
To the south there's a huge junction with pipes leading east and west.
To the west there's an odd looking room with totally smooth walls.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks as if it's made of stainless steel, and it would very well function as a club of considerable power, but alas ... You can't take at all since it's firmly set into the concrete wall.

Room.Name: A triple junction
Room.Description: You stand in a junction with pipes leading west, north and east.

Exit.Description: To the north there's a ENORMOUS quadruple sewer junction, all lit up by an odd light.
East. You can just make out a triple junction leading north and east.
West. You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

Room.Name: A bend in the sewer pipe
Room.Description: You can look in two directions where the pipe leads : south and west.

Exit.Description: To the south you can see another bend leading west.
West. You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

Room.Name: The sewer pipe bend
Room.Description: You can look in two different directions where the pipe goes : west and north.

Exit.Description: North. You see another bend leading west.
You can see another junction although this one is a triple one with pipes going south and west.

Room.Name: The pit
Room.Description: You stand in a section of a pipe that leads to a dead end. In the floor there's a pit leading down. There are bars set in the side of the pit wall functioning as a ladder.

Exit.Description: West. You can see a dimly lit quadruple junction with an exit up.
Down the pit it's utterly dark you can't see a thing.

Room.Name: The round room
Room.Description: As you enter the room it starts rotating - at first slowly, later faster and faster - You get totally confused as to where up and down are, but you are certain that the doorway is in the opposite direction of what it was when you entered. It now leads east. There was only this one exit.

Exit.Description: You can just make out a smaller room with a chair.

Room.Name: The three way junction
Room.Description: You are standing in a junction of pipes that lead west, east and south.

Exit.Description: East. You can make out a dimly lit Guard Room.
To the south you can see what looks like a store room.
West. You see another junction similar to this one leading north and south.

Room.Name: The Sewer Store Room
Room.Description: You stand in a small room lit by a single torch set in the wall. The only way out of here is to the north.

Exit.Description: To the north you see a pipe junction.

Room.Name: The Shaft
Room.Description: You are standing by the edge of a deep, dark shaft leading down. A single ladder is your tool to work your way down if you so wish. The sewer pipe leads south from here.

Exit.Description: To the south you can see the pipe leading further south into darkness.
Down and utter darkness. There's absolutely nothing to be seen in that direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Firmly set into the wall of the shaft it's impossible to even rock, is your estimate.

Room.Name: The Sewer Entrance
Room.Description: You stand in the middle of a pipe that leads from north to south. Above you an air shaft leads up into sunlight. It seems totally impossible to go up that way.

Exit.Description: To the north you can just make out a huge shaft leading down.
To the south you can see a triple junction leading west and east.

Room.Name: The junction going three ways
Room.Description: You are in a passageway in the pipes of the sewer system leading north, east and west.

Exit.Description: You see a sewer pipe leading north.
West. You see another junction very similar to this one that leads north and west.

Room.Name: The Sewer Room
Room.Description: You are standing in a large room with chairs set in the walls. You have the feeling of being watched. To the south there's an entry to a larger room. The room is lit by five torches, also set in the walls. To the west there is a doorway leading out to the sewers.

Exit.Description: You can see an even larger room than this one, filled with light.
To the west you can see the sewers.

Room.Name: The Sewer room
Room.Description: This is a Room with walls that glitters like gold though not quite like it. This is strange as it looks as if the glitter lights the whole room. It looks very bright. To the south the floor is covered with yucky water. The North leads to sort of a Guard Room.

Exit.Description: To the north you can see the guard room.
To the south there is nothing but water and an exit leads east from there.

Room.Name: The Pool in the Sewer
Room.Description: You stand in water to your waist. To the north is the entrance to this room. A single door leads east.

Exit.Description: To the north you see the entrance to this room.
You can see an enormous hall through the doorway.

Room.Name: The Sewers
Room.Description: You stand in a dead end of the sewer. The only way out is south. You can see a shaft leading up but it looks too difficult to go up that way.

Room.Name: The junction
Room.Description: You stand in a junction leading north, west and east.

Exit.Description: Darkness has closed in on that part of the sewer system, you can't see a thing in that direction.
West. You see another junction very similar to this one that leads north and west.

Room.Name: The small room
Room.Description: The only thing in this room of interest is a chair, and that's tight to the rock floor. A doorway leads south and another leads east into darkness.

Exit.Description: Utter darkness...!
You can see a room with a lot of light in it. You can't make out any details.

ExtraDescription.Description: This chair is made of marble, but the fact that it is worn and attached to the floor makes you think twice about taking it along with you.

Room.Name: The Sewer pipe
Room.Description: You are in what reminds you of a foul sewer, as if you liked being here! You can see two exits leading either north or south.

Exit.Description: To the south you can see a strange light flowing from there.

Room.Name: The Grand Sewer
Room.Description: You are in a Grand Sewer Pipe. This stretches toward the south. It's large indeed! A doorway leads to the east from here.

Exit.Description: To the north you can see a doorway.
You can't see anything in that darkness.
In the south end of the pipe the "floor" is completely covered with water.

Room.Name: The South end of the Grand Pipe
Room.Description: You stand in water to your knees. A doorway leads west from here. The Pipe stretches north.

Exit.Description: You see a lot of pictures decorating the walls.

Room.Name: The Edge of The Water Sewer
Room.Description: You stand in a room where half of the floor is covered in water. The water leads east and a doorway leads west.

Exit.Description: You can hardly make out much more than that the next place is in a pipe with more water.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

Room.Name: The Dark hallway
Room.Description: You can't see much of this, even with a light. The hallway goes into a passageway to the south. A doorway leads west.

Exit.Description: You can see nothing at all, because it's completely dark in that direction.
You see a lot of light, bright as daylight, but nothing of interest.

Room.Name: The dark passageway
Room.Description: You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The passageway seems to continue south and north.

Exit.Description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

Room.Name: The dark passageway
Room.Description: You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The passageway seems to continue south and north.

Exit.Description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

Room.Name: The dark passageway
Room.Description: You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The passageway seems to continue south and north.

Exit.Description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

Room.Name: The dark passageway
Room.Description: You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The passageway seems to continue west and north. To the east there's water covering the floor and that leads through an arched entry to a watery sewer.

Exit.Description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

Room.Name: The Watery Sewer Bend
Room.Description: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer seems to bend and lead south and west.

Exit.Description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

Room.Name: The Watery sewer
Room.Description: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer seems to lead south and north.

Exit.Description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

Room.Name: The Watery sewer
Room.Description: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer seems to lead south and north.

Exit.Description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

Room.Name: The Watery Sewer Junction
Room.Description: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer seems to lead into a junction going south, north and east.

Exit.Description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

Room.Name: The Watery sewer
Room.Description: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer seems to lead south and north.

Exit.Description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

Room.Name: The Watery sewer junction
Room.Description: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer seems to lead into a junction that goes north, south and east.

Exit.Description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

Room.Name: The Watery sewer
Room.Description: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer seems to lead south and north.

Exit.Description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

Room.Name: The Watery sewer bend
Room.Description: You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer seems to bend and lead west and north.

Exit.Description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

Room.Name: A ledge by the dark pool
Room.Description: You can't see much here but the echo tells you that there's quite a drop down. You can just make out a huge dark pool out there in the darkness, mostly because of the trickling of water. The water from the sewer actually washes over this ledge and makes it quite slippery. From here it drops, like a waterfall, into the pool far down.

Exit.Description: You can't see a thing. It's too dark.
You can't see a thing. It's too dark.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

Room.Name: A ledge by the dark pool
Room.Description: You can't see much here but the echo tells you that there's quite a drop down. You can just make out a huge dark pool out there in the darkness, mostly because of the trickling of water. The water from the sewer actually washes over this ledge and makes it quite slippery. From here it drops, like a waterfall, into the pool far down. Under you there is a small fissure in the rock. It seems big enough to contain a few people.

Exit.Description: You can't see a thing. It's too dark.
You can't see a thing. It's too dark.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

Room.Name: The fissure under the ledge
Room.Description: This is a small fissure in the solid rock. Under you lies the deep dark pool. The water trickles quietly down from the ledge above you. The water smells like the water in a sewer.

Exit.Description: The water edge.

Room.Name: Under the mudhole
Room.Description: You stand in a small room with a great big opening in the ceiling. From this opening there's mud dripping down in large lumps. >YUCK<. You can smell the foul stench of the slimy sediment as you try not to get covered by the falling sludge. To the east there is an entryway leading out from here and it seems absolutely impossible to force the muddy descent.

Exit.Description: East. You see nothing of interest.

ExtraDescription.Description: You never saw such disgusting matter before, it nearly makes you puke.

Room.Name: Under the Dark Pit
Room.Description: Nice place you found yourself. You stand in the middle of a room with only two exits, Up and East. A tall ladder is left here so that you can climb up through the Pit without the use of a rope.

Exit.Description: Up. You can't see a thing up there, it's way too dark.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is funny enough a wooden ladder and, after closer inspection, you discover it is magically held towards the wall! You can't, even with your greatest effort, rock it at ALL!

Room.Name: A muddy bend in the sewer system
Room.Description: You are standing in what looks like a bend in the pipe system of the sewer. The 'floor' is covered completely by mud! This includes covering your legs up to your knees as well. The pipe leads west and south.

Exit.Description: To the south there's less mud than here! It actually seems to end there! You have a feeling it would be nice to have your feet free from mud again.
You can see a room in which mud drips from the roof onto the floor in great cakes of sludge. There doesn't seem to be any exits from that room apart from in you direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: You never saw such disgusting matter before, it nearly makes you puke.

Room.Name: A junction in the sewer pipes
Room.Description: You stand in the middle of what looks like a triple junction of pipes going east, west and north.

Exit.Description: You can see a mud area starting in that direction.
East. You can't even make out what it might look like, it's just too dark.
West. There's a room with a ladder leading up.

Room.Name: Down the old well
Room.Description: You are dangling on the slippery sides of the old well leading down and up. The only secure point here is the metal bars that are cemented into the sides, the ones that you cling frantically to so that you don't fall. Who knows how deep this well is?

Exit.Description: There's a slight, dim light from above, or maybe it's your imagination. Anyway it SEEMS darker down here than up there, if that is possible.

ExtraDescription.Description: These look like they're pretty slippery, and not very safe. You'd better not go down any further.

Room.Name: The northwestern corner of the ledge
Room.Description: You stand, swaying out from the ledge, with only a couple of inches of safe, solid ledge under your feet. The ledge continues to the east but not back south. It seems that the ledge is too narrow to turn on so you'll have to continue forward.

Exit.Description: The ledge continues east.
The ledge continues south.

Room.Name: The narrow ledge
Room.Description: You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards.

Exit.Description: North. The ledge leads into a corner and turns eastward.
You stare into mid-air, and right under there's absolutely nothing but darkness. You shiver by the thought of falling an utterly unknown distance.
South. The ledge leads further south into utter darkness.

Room.Name: The narrow ledge
Room.Description: You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards.

Exit.Description: North. The ledge leads further north.
You stare into mid-air, and right under there's absolutely nothing but darkness. You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.
The ledge continues further south into darkness.

Room.Name: The narrow ledge
Room.Description: You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards.

Exit.Description: North. The ledge leads further north.
You stare into mid-air, and right under there's absolutely nothing but darkness. You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.
The ledge continues south into darkness.

Room.Name: The narrow ledge
Room.Description: You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards.

Exit.Description: North. The ledge leads further north.
You stare into mid-air, and right under there's absolutely nothing but darkness. You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.
South. You can just make out the south-western corner of this ledge.

Room.Name: The southwestern corner of the ledge
Room.Description: This seems like a ledge that is a little broader than the one just to the north of here. The ledge seems to lead around some sort of Abyss of total darkness. The ledge seems to have an odd-looking edge here.

Exit.Description: North. The ledge leads further north.
You see a broad ledge leading eastward.
South of here is the exit from the ledge.
The Abyss lies down there. Who knows what might lurk down there?

ExtraDescription.Description: This is truly a weird piece of craftsmanship in your eyes. The edge seems to form a step leading down, but WHAT a STEP DOWN. The Abyss opens down there leading to seemingly total destruction.
A small rock sticks out right under it, otherwise the way is DOWN, DOWN, and SPLAT!!!
It looks as if it can be opened in a door-like fashion. Maybe this will lead the way down.

Room.Name: An odd intersection
Room.Description: You stand in a rather odd intersection of pipes. The pipes actually don't resemble pipes anymore. They look more like a real stone tunnel, or a passageway hewn directly into the rock. The ways from here lead north, east and west.

Exit.Description: North. You see a ledge to something that looks like an abyss.

Room.Name: The narrow ledge going east to west
Room.Description: You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there's no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards.

Exit.Description: The ledge leads further east.
You stare into mid-air, and right under there's absolutely nothing but darkness. You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.
The ledge leads further west.

Room.Name: Mid-air
Room.Description: You've just stepped into the most unlucky position in the whole of Merc Mud. The result of such a foolish act should be punished with death, you know. With an acceleration of approximately 9.82 metres per second per second, you are now descending the Abyss. What awaits you at the bottom will continue to be a mystery. Bye Cruel World. You've fallen, and you can't get up!!!

Room.Name: The Broad ledge
Room.Description: You are standing on a ledge that seems quite a lot larger than the rest of the ledges. This one leads to the west and the east, plus it has an exit going to the south. Though you could jump into mid-air, but it probably wouldn't be such a good idea. The way south is in utter darkness.

Room.Name: The northeastern corner of the ledge
Room.Description: You stand, swaying out from the ledge, with only a couple of inches of safe, solid ledge under your feet. The ledge continues to the west and leads south from here into darkness.

Exit.Description: The ledge continues west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ground here seems a little different from all the other ledges along the Abyss. There's a kind of soft soil on this ledge, maybe you should look carefully at this. It seems to be of some interest.

You can just make out the outline of a trapdoor here in the soil. The earth is probably there to conceal a secret entrance. This looks as if it leads down into the seemingly solid rock face of the ledge.

Room.Name: The narrow eastern ledge
Room.Description: You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards. And THAT is west of here so watch your step.

Exit.Description: The ledge leads further south.
You stare into mid-air, and right under there's absolutely nothing but darkness. You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

Room.Name: The narrow eastern ledge
Room.Description: You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards. And THAT is west of here so watch your step.

Exit.Description: The ledge leads further south.
You stare into mid-air, and right under there's absolutely nothing but darkness. You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

Room.Name: The narrow eastern ledge
Room.Description: You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards. And THAT is west of here so watch your step.

Exit.Description: The ledge leads further south.
You stare into mid-air, and right under there's absolutely nothing but darkness. You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

Room.Name: The narrow eastern ledge
Room.Description: You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards. And THAT is west of here so watch your step. You also see a small opening to the east.

Exit.Description: East. You stare into darkness.
The ledge leads further south.
You stare into mid-air, and right under there's absolutely nothing but darkness. You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

Room.Name: The southeastern corner of the ledge
Room.Description: This seems like a ledge that is a little broader than the one just to the north of here. The ledge seems to lead around some sort of abyss of total darkness.

Exit.Description: North of here you can see a ledge.
The ledge leads further west.

Room.Name: Under the pit
Room.Description: You stand in a completely dark cavern leading west. The wall looks weird here.

ExtraDescription.Description: There is a crack here that looks like it has been made recently.

Room.Name: Under The Shaft
Room.Description: A ladder leads up from here to the Shaft. A small opening leads west from here.

Exit.Description: You can see a narrow ledge going north and south.
It's too dark up there.

Room.Name: The sewer line.
Room.Description: You are in a narrow part of the sewer. Down the sewer continues and to the north is the ledge.

Exit.Description: You can see the southern part of the ledge.
You look deeper down into the drain.

Room.Name: The sewer pipe.
Room.Description: You are in an odd sewer pipe You see some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat. You can see some slimy water gently running down into a sewer drain, and north the drain continues.

Room.Name: Mid-air
Room.Description: You've just stepped into the most unlucky position in the whole of DikuMUD. The result of such a foolish act should be punished with death, you know. With an acceleration of approximately 9.82 metres per second per second, you are now descending the Abyss. What awaits you at the bottom will continue to be a mystery. Bye Cruel World. You've fallen, and you can't get up!!!

Room.Name: The Edge of the Water
Room.Description: The pool side is dimly lit up by your light. You can see absolutely nothing else nearby. The darkness here seems enormously oppressive. The air is damp and the rock on which you stand is slippery. The pool seems too dark to make anything clear. The rock can be climbed upwards from here.

Room.Name: The Treasury
Room.Description: You are in a small but well equipped treasury. You can see some writing on the wall. The ceiling has a funny glow, which enables you to see. You can get back into the inner lair through the stone door which is east.

Exit.Description: You look back through the opening into the inner lair.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is a heavy black stone door it looks very solid.
You read the number '666'.

Room.Name: The inner Lair
Room.Description: You are in a octagonal room with smooth purple stone walls. The floor is made from black stone. In the western wall you see a large black stone door.

Exit.Description: You look back through the door into the lair.
You see the treasury.

Room.Name: The Lair
Room.Description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce. To the north are a wooden door.

Exit.Description: You can see the inner lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.

ExtraDescription.Description: On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the forehead. All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

Room.Name: The Lair
Room.Description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

Exit.Description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.

ExtraDescription.Description: On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the forehead. All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

Room.Name: The Lair
Room.Description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

Exit.Description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You see the lair entrance.

ExtraDescription.Description: On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the forehead. All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

Room.Name: The Lair
Room.Description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

Exit.Description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.

ExtraDescription.Description: On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the forehead. All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

Room.Name: The lair.
Room.Description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

Exit.Description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.

ExtraDescription.Description: All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

Room.Name: The lair.
Room.Description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

Exit.Description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.

ExtraDescription.Description: On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the forehead. All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

Room.Name: The lair entrance.
Room.Description: You are in a dry part of the sewer. To the north is a wooden door, you can see some slime at the lower part of the door. You also see some skulls and some broken bones.

Exit.Description: You can see the lair.
You see a crawlway.

ExtraDescription.Description: The slime is slimy and uninteresting.

Room.Name: The crawlway.
Room.Description: You are in a narrow crawlway. You don't notice anything interesting here.

Exit.Description: You see a four-way junction.
You see the entrance to a lair.

Room.Name: The four-way junction.
Room.Description: You are in a sewer junction. To the north is a small hole, to the west is a narrow crawlway and to the east and south the sewer continues.

Exit.Description: You can see a small cave-like room.
You can see a sewer drain.
You can see a sewer drain.
You can see a narrow crawlway.

Room.Name: The small cave.
Room.Description: You are in a collapsed sewer drain, which now is more like a small cave.

Exit.Description: You look back into the four-way junction.

Room.Name: The sewer drain.
Room.Description: You are in a dry sewer drain which bends to the north.

Exit.Description: You can see the drain continuing north.
You can see the four-way junction.

Room.Name: The sewer drain.
Room.Description: You are in a dry sewer drain which bends to the east.

Exit.Description: You can see the drain continuing east.
You can see the drain continuing south.

Room.Name: The drain end.
Room.Description: You are at the end of the drain around you the sewer has collapsed, the only exit is west.

Exit.Description: You see the sewer drain.

Room.Name: The half-wet drain.
Room.Description: You are in a sewer drain where the floor is covered with water. To the north it looks more dry, south however the drain runs down into some water.

Exit.Description: To the north lies a dry four-way junction.
To the south you see a sewer drain filled with water.

ExtraDescription.Description: The water is dirty but it looks like you would be able to swim in it.

Room.Name: Under water in the sewer.
Room.Description: You swim in some dirty water and is holding you breath. You'll better continue before you drown. It is a good thing that you can hold your light above water-level.

Exit.Description: It is hard to see, but it looks like the drain runs slightly upwards.
It is hard to see, but it looks like the drain runs a little bit upwards.

Room.Name: The half-dry drain.
Room.Description: You are in a half-dry sewer drain. To the north the drain runs a little bit downwards into some water to the east you can see a small hole. To the west you see another drain.

Exit.Description: You see the drain running down into some water.
Through the hole you can just make out a very small room.
You see a drain running to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The water is dirty but it looks like you would be able to swim in it.
Through the hole you can just make out a very small room.

Room.Name: The very small room.
Room.Description: You are in a very small room, it is pretty uninteresting.

Exit.Description: Through the little hole you can see a half-dry drain.

Room.Name: A dry sewer drain.
Room.Description: You are in a dry but dirty sewer drain. The drain continues east and south.

Exit.Description: You see a half-dry drain.
You see another boring sewer drain.

Room.Name: A boring drain.
Room.Description: You are in yet another sewer drain.

Exit.Description: You see a sewer drain continuing to the north.
You can see another drain to the east.

Room.Name: The sewer drain.
Room.Description: You are in a sewer drain, there is nothing special in here, except for a loud echo.

Exit.Description: You can see another sewer drain.
You can make out a sewer drain to the west.
You can see a sewer line.

Room.Name: The sewer drain.
Room.Description: You are in a drain, with some slimy water on the floor.

Exit.Description: You see a sewer bend.
You see a sewer drain.

ExtraDescription.Description: The water floats to the east from here.

Room.Name: The sewer bend.
Room.Description: You find yourself in an ordinary sewer bend, which bend from west to north.

Exit.Description: You see a sewer drain.
You see a sewer drain.

Room.Name: The sewer junction
Room.Description: You stand in a junction of three sewer drains. You see some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat.North and south the sewer continues as usual, but west it looks a little strange.

Exit.Description: You see nothing but a sewer drain.
You see nothing but a sewer drain.
You see a strange sewer pipe.

Room.Name: The sewer
Room.Description: You are in a sewer, where the slimy water runs down through a tiny hole. You see some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat. There is a sewer drain south.

Exit.Description: You see a sewer drain.

Room.Name: The strange sewer
Room.Description: You are in a very strange sewer indeed, there are some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat. And you can see a lot of organic decay like bones from animals AND humans. West the drain runs slightly upwards.

Exit.Description: You see a sewer junction.
You see a slimy sewer drain.

Room.Name: The damp sewer
Room.Description: You are in a sewer drain with a funny damp substance on the floor, in the substance you see a lot of decay. You see some odd scratches on the wall, as from a gigantic rat. Both to the east and west the pipe seems to run down.

Exit.Description: You see a sewer.
You see a sewer.

Room.Name: The strange sewer
Room.Description: You are in an ordinary sewer except for a lot of scratches on the sewer wall, ad a lot of debris on the floor.

Exit.Description: You see a sewer.
You see another sewer.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see a lot of organic decay on the floor.

Room.Name: The sewer
Room.Description: You are in a sewer with more scratches on the walls. And of course a whole lot of decay. The drain runs east and north.

Exit.Description: You see yet another sewer line.
You see a sewer pipe.

Room.Name: The sewer drain
Room.Description: You stand in in a sewer drain, you are able to see some kind of cave-like room. You see some odd scratches on the drain wall, as from a gigantic rat. The sewer leads south.

Exit.Description: You see a cave-like room.
You see a sewer.

Room.Name: The rat's lair
Room.Description: You are in a little cave. You are able to see quite a lot of debris on the floor. There is a sewer drain west of here.

Exit.Description: You see the sewer system that way.

Room.Name: The Wall of the Abyss
Room.Description: You hang onto some steps leading down into utter darkness. There's an exit leading up as well, though you'll have to open the tiny rock again to do so.

Room.Name: The entrance.
Room.Description: You are in a very dark room. You notice that some faces are staring at you from inside the walls. In the middle of the room there is a small altar. To the north there is a small round door.

Exit.Description: A beam of red light seeps through a hole in the door.

ExtraDescription.Description: This altar are very special. Faces are smiling from it. There is a triangle in top of it.
The triangle is filled with small symbols in a language you have never seen before.

Room.Name: The corridor.
Room.Description: The corridor is glowing oppressively in a red hue. You can hear wailing through an open black hole to the east. To the south there is a round door.

Exit.Description: The hole seems more black than the night. It is appears to be "eating" the red light around it.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is completely round without a keyhole.
The red light glows from the walls.
The walls look alive.

Room.Name: The Realm of lost souls
Room.Description: You are standing in nothing. All around you there are stars. Sometimes a shadow flies closely by you, wailing very loudly. To the north there is a small bright hole. To the west there is a small red hole.

Exit.Description: You look into a very bright hole.
You look into a red hole.

ExtraDescription.Description: The shadow looks like a man in great pain.

Room.Name: The T-crossing
Room.Description: You are in a small hallway. There are doors to the east and to the west. To the south there are a black hole. There is writing in the wall. Wails can be heard from the south.

Exit.Description: Too dark to tell.
A black hole in the wall.
You can see a big fire to the west. It looks like a unhealthy place to enter!

ExtraDescription.Description: The writing says 'The one to the east, belongs to the beast. To the west you will surely END your quest!'.

Room.Name: The firedeath
Room.Description: This room is very hot. There are flames surrounding you. You can see no exits at all! Skeletons are lying all over the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: The skeletons looks like they had suffered the death of hunger. One of them looks like he has written something at the wall.
The writing says 'A pray to the GODS will not be heard, though the only exit is death..... Mother, I love you'.

Room.Name: The tortureroom.
Room.Description: You are standing in a middle of a square room. Along the walls skeletons are hanging in rusty chains. In the middle of the room there is a big metal box, covered with dust. To the south you can just make out a small exit.

Exit.Description: To dark to tell.

ExtraDescription.Description: When you look at the skeletons, you can see that they once had been in great pain. They are hanging in their arms, and some of them has been killed with a sharp instrument.
The metal box is covered with dust. You notice that is once has been filled with coal, as you see some of them.

Room.Name: The hells yard
Room.Description: You are standing in a lot of mud. A disgusting smell surrounds the place, and makes you feel sick. Small flames sometimes shoot up from the hot mud. To the west there is a small door. To the north you can see an iron door.

Exit.Description: To dark to tell.
To dark to tell.

Room.Name: The Entrance to the Realm of silence
Room.Description: This is an utterly silent place. As you look around you see that there hasn't been a living thing in a long time. The dust lies here in a thick layer on the floor and on the furniture. On the wall hangs a bleak and worn tapestry. A winding stone staircase leads up into darkness. On the wall to the west you can see a huge torch stuck into the solid rock. A large portcullis blocks your way to the north.

ExtraDescription.Description: This seems like an exceptionally heavy gate, made of thick iron.
This VERY old torch looks as if it has burned for ages, yet no traces of the searing flame can be seen on it!

This looks as if it has been standing here for at least 12 centuries. It's Very worn and cracks in the surface mingle with the cores of mineral that penetrates the rock from which these steps are chiselled.

Room.Name: On the walls of the Abyss
Room.Description: You are clutching the steps on the wall so that you don't fall to the ground down below. A large sign says : I haven't gotten any further ... Yet. But I'm pushing to get finished with this sewer. Greetings and Good Health :) Redferne The Gentle This stops your journey down, the only exit is up.

Room.Name: Cave entrance
Room.Description: You are standing in the cave entrance. It is very dark down here. There is writing at the wall. There is an exit to the north. A stairway leads up.

Exit.Description: To the north you can see a small tunnel.
You can see the stairs going up into darkness.

ExtraDescription.Description: The writing says 'BEWARE adventurer!'

Room.Name: Cave tunnel
Room.Description: You are walking in a tunnel. It is very cold. You can feel the presence of a living thing ... SOMEWHERE.

Exit.Description: To the north you can see the tunnel continuing.
To the south tunnel continuing.

Room.Name: Cave room
Room.Description: You are standing in a room. It's much cooler now. The walls are glowing.

Exit.Description: To the east you see the tunnel going downwards.
To the south you see a dark cave tunnel.

Room.Name: Cave T-cross
Room.Description: You are standing in a mud-like substance. The smell here is awful, it is rotten. To the west you can see some light.

Exit.Description: To the east the tunnel still goes downwards.
You can see some light to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: When you examine the mud, you notice small worms crawling around.
The worms are purple. They do not look edible.

Room.Name: Cave turning-point
Room.Description: The mud are getting deeper. You are wondering, 'Would it be an idea to leave, before I disappear?'. To the south you notice a flat round stone are blocking the way. To the west you can see mud.

Exit.Description: You can see an opening behind the stone.

ExtraDescription.Description: The stone looks very uninteresting. BUT as you are about to turn away, you see a lightstribe coming through a small hole. Conclusion: The stone is movable.

Room.Name: The secret room
Room.Description: There is dust all over the place. It looks like nobody has been here for ages. In the middle of the room you see a socket with a crystal globe. The globe glows with a pulsing light. To the north you see a stone door. To the south you see a grey block.

Exit.Description: You see a round stone door.
You see a grey block.

ExtraDescription.Description: The socket looks like the work of a dwarf. It is VERY beautiful.
The crystal globe is glowing with a pulsing light. It looks like there is smoke inside it.

Room.Name: The mudhole
Room.Description: You are standing in a lot of mud. The mud goes to your chest. You feel the presence of something IN the mud. The only obvious exit is to the west.

Exit.Description: You can see nothing at all.

Room.Name: Tunnel
Room.Description: The mud goes to your knees. Otherwise the tunnel looks very normal.

Exit.Description: You can see a mudhole.

Room.Name: The long tunnel
Room.Description: Here There is almost no mud, as you stand at the top of a small rock. Just beside you there are a sign which says 'WARNING! The worms are dangerous!'.

Exit.Description: You can see a lot of mud..Yarck!
The tunnel goes a little downwards.

Room.Name: The hot room
Room.Description: You are very surprised, as this room for a change are hot instead of cold. To the north it goes downwards into some mud. There are also an exit to the west.

Exit.Description: You see a lot of mud.
You see a entrance to a small room.

Room.Name: The small room
Room.Description: As you look around you notice a small statue. There are exits to the west and to the east.

Exit.Description: It is pitch dark out there.
You see a VERY long hallway.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is a statue of a imp, pointing to the west. The imp looks like a man with horns and a tail.

Room.Name: The stalagmite cave
Room.Description: You are standing in a stalagmite cave. Water is dripping from the walls. It is very cold in here.

Exit.Description: You see a long hallway, and some mud.

ExtraDescription.Description: The stalagmites are very tall, and looks very beautiful.

Room.Name: The stalagmite tunnel
Room.Description: You have entered a small tunnel. Here it is quite dry. Maybe it would be an idea to rest here.

Exit.Description: You can see a small cave to the north.

Room.Name: The spongy room
Room.Description: You definitely NOT like this area. It is very dank, and most of the places it is wet.

Room.Name: The stalagmite T-cross
Room.Description: You are standing in a cross. To the north you can see some light. Otherwise it is dark.

Exit.Description: You see some light ahead.

Room.Name: The blind end room
Room.Description: This room is obviously a blind end. To the north you see a primitive picture.

Exit.Description: You see a primitive picture

ExtraDescription.Description: You see some persons dancing around a huge sun. The sun is about 7 feet in diameter, which shows the size of the picture.

Room.Name: The treasure room
Room.Description: This room is rich ornamented. The walls has carves showing persons dancing around a sun which is drawn at the floor. It looks very old, and it is very dusty. To the south you see a secret door.

Exit.Description: you can see a picture with some persons crawling around a huge moon.

Room.Name: The square lair
Room.Description: You are standing in the south-east part of the lair. You can see a skeleton lying at the wall.

Exit.Description: Another part of the lair
Another part of the lair

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks like a adventurer who wasn't lucky. You better watch out-

Room.Name: The square lair
Room.Description: You are standing in the north-east part of the lair. You see a sign at the wall

Exit.Description: You see a wooden door
another part of the lair.
another part of the lair.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sign says 'Gods of War I call you, my sword is by my side, I seek a light free from all false pride' Reyemle Grug.....

Room.Name: The square lair
Room.Description: You are standing in the north-west part of the lair. Here's another sign. There are a exit from the lair to the north.

Exit.Description: You see a small tunnel leading north.
another part of the lair.
another part of the lair.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sign says 'I'm wandering around in a everlasting tale, seeking the light to regain my pride Corama...

Room.Name: The lair end
Room.Description: You can see a table in front of you. It's very dusty. Around the table five skeletons are siting. Exits are north and east.

Exit.Description: the northern part of the lair.
the eastern part of the lair.

ExtraDescription.Description: On the table there is dust, in the center there is a small statue of a Dragon sleeping.
You can see that they have been killed in some sort of way. Not by sword or club.
it looks like a silver dragon. It is nailed onto the table. The dragon sits on a red dragon that looks dead. But the eyes of the red dragon is glowing pulsating red. You feel drained.

Room.Name: East tunnel
Room.Description: You are standing in dark tunnel, the exits are east and west. To the west you see a wooden door.

Exit.Description: You can see a muddy tunnel.
You can see a wooden door.

Room.Name: North tunnel
Room.Description: You are standing in a dark tunnel, it leads upwards.

Exit.Description: The dark tunnel continues.
You can see the lair.
You can see a cave entrance.

Room.Name: The L-shaped room.
Room.Description: You are standing in deep darkness. To the south there is a small exit. To the east you can see a gaping hole.

Room.Name: The Circular hall.
Room.Description: You are standing in round hall. To the north, east and south you can see a stone head hanging on the walls.

Exit.Description: you see nothing special.
you see a room far away.

ExtraDescription.Description: When you study the faces of the heads you see that it is faces of dragons. The face to the north is red, the face to the east is green and the face to the south is blue.
This looks like a evil dragon
This looks like a neutral dragon
This looks like a good dragon

Room.Name: Dusty tunnel
Room.Description: You are standing in dust. This place has not been touched for a long time. Otherwise it is quite boring here, looks like a place to rest! To the west you see the outline of a door. A tunnel leads to the east.

Exit.Description: You see a tunnel which leads downwards. It is quite dark.
You can see the outline of a door. Just like in the description!

Room.Name: The crossing
Room.Description: You are standing in a crossing of hallways. You can leave this place in every direction, except up and down. In the dust you notice strange footprints.

ExtraDescription.Description: You have never seen this kind of footprints before!

Room.Name: The L-shaped room
Room.Description: You are standing in a L-shaped room. You can hear noises from the long tunnel to the east. You can feel fear! A sign is hanging on the wall.

Exit.Description: a long dark tunnel.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sign says 'DANGER!!'.

Room.Name: Dragons lair
Room.Description: You can see burned walls, the floorstones are fiery red. All kinds of bones are scattered all over the floor. On the walls you can see some burned shapes. You smell burned flesh. Two creatures are melted into the floor. You're next.

Exit.Description: You can see a long tunnel.
You can see nothing but darkness.

Room.Name: The burned room
Room.Description: You are in a room, which once had been quite burned. There is writing on the wall.

Exit.Description: You can see a red glow

ExtraDescription.Description: The writing says 'DANGER!!!'

Room.Name: The wind tunnel
Room.Description: You are standing in a tunnel. Above you, you can feel a breeze.

Exit.Description: To dark to tell

ExtraDescription.Description: The breeze comes from a hole above you. NO way to get up there.

Room.Name: The glittering room
Room.Description: This room are all bright. In the walls you can see some silver. Exits are: West, east and south.

ExtraDescription.Description: The glittering silver looks like it is INSIDE the walls.

Room.Name: The secret passageroom
Room.Description: You have entered a tiny room. There WAS an exit down, and an exit to the west.

Exit.Description: You can see a light to the west

ExtraDescription.Description: A sign is blocking the way. It says 'we have closed an entrance to DEATH'

Room.Name: End of long tunnel
Room.Description: You are at a end of a long tunnel. Right in front of you, you can see a grey mass. To the east you can see a tremendous long tunnel, but you know that, you has just been there.

Exit.Description: Long tunnel. JUST like in the description!
A grey mass is blocking the way.

ExtraDescription.Description: The mass is nothing but a mass, but it is quite suspicious!

Room.Name: Stair-room
Room.Description: You are standing in a small room. Drawings of faces in pain are on the walls. You can feel that darkness is ruling this place. there are two exits: south and down. You have a feeling the downward exit isn't finished yet...

Exit.Description: nothing but darkness

Room.Name: Dark tunnel
Room.Description: You are standing in a dark tunnel. It continues to the north and to the south. Bones are spread on the floor

ExtraDescription.Description: it looks like bones of a human.

Room.Name: Entrance to lair
Room.Description: The smell here is awful. To the south you can see some smoke. A tunnel leads north, and east.

Exit.Description: A small cave is to the east.
the only thing you can see are smoke.

Room.Name: North-eastern part of Basilisks cave
Room.Description: It is hard to see here because of the smoke. To the north you can see barely see a small tunnel. Other exits are to the south and to the west.

Room.Name: South-eastern part of basilisks cave
Room.Description: There are a very small hole in wall, from where the smoke are coming from. Otherwise it is pitch dark. Exits are north and west.

Exit.Description: You can see nothing but smoke
You can see nothing but smoke

ExtraDescription.Description: It's a small hole. About 1 feet in diameter.

Room.Name: North-western part of basilisks cave
Room.Description: You can see some hay spread on the floor. The smell is awful here, and it makes you feel sick. The basilisk sleeps here. Watch out ... Maybe it is not far away.

ExtraDescription.Description: The hay is very dirty. The smell of it makes you feel sick.

Room.Name: South-western part of basilisks cave
Room.Description: You can see nothing but smoke.

Room.Name: The small cave
Room.Description: You are standing in small cave. You can see some light in the end. Exits are north and south.

Exit.Description: You can see only smoke.
You can see a blue glow. And you feel a fresh breeze.

Room.Name: The northern end of the pool
Room.Description: You have wet feet, you are standing in water. The water looks calm. You can see that it's a big lake. Light seeps from the water.

Exit.Description: You can see a small cave.
You can see more water.
You can see water.

Room.Name: The pool
Room.Description: You are swimming in water. It is getting deep here. It is dark in this end.

Exit.Description: You can see some bubbles in the water.
You see calm water.

Room.Name: The south end of the pool
Room.Description: You standing in water up to you neck. You can only see water.

Exit.Description: You can see calm water.
To dark to tell, but you can feel something nearby.

Room.Name: The pool
Room.Description: You are swimming in DARKNESS. You feel something touching your right leg.

Exit.Description: To dark to tell.
You can feel a warm breeze.

NPC.name: oldstyle mud monster mudmonster
NPC.description: It sure looks like something out of a horror movie. It strongly resembles a huge figure made up from mud alone, and it sure looks like it had human flesh for breakfast and is strongly intent on having the same for dinner.
NPC.longDescription: A horrifying mudmonster is slowly evolving from the mud ...

NPC.name: oldstyle bat
NPC.description: You have never in your entire life seen such a mean looking small creature, though it looks rather peaceful, hanging there. The thought of arousing this cruel creature doesn't seem appealing.
NPC.longDescription: The small fierce-looking bat is hanging from the ceiling.

NPC.name: oldstyle rat
NPC.longDescription: The huge hungry-looking sewer rat sits here.

NPC.name: oldstyle spider
NPC.longDescription: The small hairy spider.

NPC.name: oldstyle beetle
NPC.longDescription: The giant mean-looking earth beetle crawls towards you.

NPC.name: oldstyle maggot
NPC.longDescription: The giant maggot crawls toward you.

NPC.name: oldstyle snake
NPC.longDescription: The snake slithers towards you.

NPC.name: oldstyle wanderer
NPC.description: The evil wanderer is very thin. He is dressed in a grey cloak.
NPC.longDescription: The evil wanderer stares at you.

NPC.name: oldstyle homonculus homo
NPC.description: The Homonculus appears in a man-like form, about 18'' tall, it has a greenish, reptilian skin, leathery wings, and a bat-like mouth, with teeth gleaming yellow.
NPC.longDescription: The homonculus is here, looking at you with an evil look.

NPC.name: oldstyle chreffn
NPC.description: The head and torso of a chreffn is copper-covered, with yellow, glowing eyes. The lower body is in an orange shading.
NPC.longDescription: The chreffn are crawling here, looking around with their yellow eyes.

NPC.name: oldstyle morkoth
NPC.description: It's a five feet tall, shadow monster. The shape of this creature lies somewhere between a human and a rat. It breaths very heavily, while staring at you with such a glint in the eyes that reminds you of immense hunger.
NPC.longDescription: The morkoth is standing here, waiting for someone to KILL!

NPC.name: oldstyle mud monster mudmonster
NPC.description: It sure looks like something out of a horror movie. It strongly resembles a huge figure made up from mud alone, and it sure looks like it had human flesh for breakfast and is strongly intent on having the same for dinner.
NPC.longDescription: A horrifying mudmonster is slowly evolving from the mud ...

NPC.name: red dragon
NPC.description: The red dragon stares at you, angrily, as it wakes when you arrives. It says 'Oh, human YOU woke me up ... Hsss', while it moves closer. 'Can one NEVER sleep in peace ... Hsss'.
NPC.longDescription: The red fierce-looking dragon stares at you angrily.

NPC.name: oldstyle sea hag
NPC.description: The sea hag is so ghastly looking that you feel the deepest fear. Big yellow eyes and sharp teeth. Its ears are very big, and it has small sharp horns. It hates beauty.
NPC.longDescription: The sea hag is swimming around here.

NPC.name: oldstyle guardian naga
NPC.description: The naga are a snake-liked creature. She is covered in green-gold scale with silvery triangles along her back. Her eyes are golden. She notice that you look at her, and she says: 'Watch out. This way leads to some evil creatures'.
NPC.longDescription: The guardian naga looks kindly at you.

NPC.name: oldstyle basilisk
NPC.description: The basilisk is a reptilian monster. It has eight legs, and a strong toothy jaws. It is dull brown with yellowish underbelly. It's eyes are glowing pale green.
NPC.longDescription: The scaled basilisk crawls towards you slowly.

NPC.name: oldstyle lemure blob
NPC.description: This looks like a vaguely human blob. Big black yellow eyes, and a mouth going a little bit out from the face. The lemure does not look interested in you at all, but anyway it attacks. It looks like it's mind has been burned out.
NPC.longDescription: The lemure blob slithers terribly precisely towards you for an attack!

NPC.name: oldstyle jones cruncher ettin
NPC.description: At the first sight you thought Jones was an orc, but when it came closer you saw his second head. He wears an animal skin dress, filthy and moth eaten. Jones really stinks...
NPC.longDescription: Jones 'Cruncher' the ettin is standing here glaring at you.

NPC.name: oldstyle herald mouse killer ettin
NPC.description: When you look at Herald, you feel pity. His dress are really poor, and the one of his heads hangs down. At the rope around his stomach hangs dead mouses and rats. He does not smell good.
NPC.longDescription: Herald 'Mouse-Killer' the ettin is standing here looking confused at you.

NPC.name: oldstyle master mind mindflayer
NPC.description: It's a seven foot tall humanoid dressed in a purple cloak, and swinging a black and purple rod above its head as if it was going to attack you any moment now. In the middle of its head are four tentacles with sharp points.
NPC.longDescription: The master mindflayer is here, looking at you with an evil look.

NPC.name: oldstyle senior mind mindflayer
NPC.description: This is a horrifying monster indeed, 6'6" high. Dressed in purple and black, and carrying a large mace in its hand. In the center of its head are four large tentacles with very sharp points.
NPC.longDescription: The senior mindflayer walks around here, looking for something useful.

NPC.name: oldstyle junior mind mindflayer
NPC.description: This mindflayer is six foot high. It has a small mace in its belt, and is dressed in purple and black cloth. It has four small tentacles in the center of its head.
NPC.longDescription: The junior mindflayer is here, watching you carefully from the corner.

NPC.name: oldstyle wererat rat were
NPC.description: The wererat is about four foot tall. It looks very much like rat, except that it is standing.
NPC.longDescription: An ugly wererat is here, looking at you with a strange flick in his eyes.

NPC.name: oldstyle rat gigantic
NPC.description: The gigantic rat is about ten foot long from head to tail and has claws the size of your head looking very nasty.
NPC.longDescription: There is a gigantic rat here, looking at you with a hungry look.

Item.Name: ring silver
Item.LongDescription: A lovely silver ring has been left here.

Item.Name: rod devil
Item.LongDescription: The mysterious devil rod lies on the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is indeed a mysterious rod. It is dark black at the base but has four very sharp purple tentacles at the end.

Item.Name: mace large
Item.LongDescription: A large mace lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The mace is pretty large with a weight of 10 lbs. The head is actually four purple tentacles tied together.

Item.Name: mace small
Item.LongDescription: A small mace has been left here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This weapon doesn't look like it does a lot of damage, but then you never know. It consists of a black handle and a purple head.

Item.Name: cloak purple
Item.LongDescription: A purple cloak lies on the floor.

Item.Name: potion neon blue
Item.LongDescription: A neon blue potion stands on the floor.

Item.Name: key black
Item.LongDescription: A black key has been left on the floor.

Item.Name: skull white
Item.LongDescription: A strange white skull lies on the floor looking at you.

ExtraDescription.Description: The skull has two small horns in the forehead. You notice some writing on the inside.
You read the number '666'.

Item.Name: stick small light
Item.LongDescription: A small stick lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The small stick does not look interesting at all. But just as you are going to throw it away you notice some small letters.
It reads 'Hold me'.

Item.Name: boots muddy
Item.LongDescription: A pair of muddy boots has been dropped here.

ExtraDescription.Keyword: The boots are muddy and they look well worn, but also very comfortable.

Item.Name: treasure coins
Item.LongDescription: There is a huge treasure here, looking very valuable.

ExtraDescription.Description: This looks like a whole lot of coins.

Item.Name: sword short
Item.LongDescription: There lies a short sword.

Item.Name: claw red redclaw
Item.LongDescription: On the floor rests an enormous red claw.

ExtraDescription.Description: This big claw looks like a part of a dragon.

Item.Name: plate breast silvery
Item.LongDescription: There is a silvery breast plate on the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: On the breast plate you notice a relief of large rose. The metal seems to be some kind of silver or platinum.

Item.Name: plates leg silvery
Item.LongDescription: On the floor you see some silvery leg plates.

ExtraDescription.Description: They seem to be made from silver or platinum. You see the outline of a rose.

Item.Name: gloves silvery
Item.LongDescription: You can see a pair of silvery gloves on the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: The gloves are made of silver threads.

Item.Name: helmet silvery
Item.LongDescription: The silvery helmet lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The helmet is made from platinum or silver and has a white fur brush attached on the top.

Item.Name: shield
Item.LongDescription: The shield of the rose rests on the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: On the shield you see a clear and perfect painting of a dark red rose on a white background. You also notice the inscription :'Pax Est Sanctuum'.

Item.Name: boots silvery
Item.LongDescription: A pair of silvery boots stand on the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: The boots are made from a silvery metal.

Item.Name: plates arm silvery
Item.LongDescription: On the floor you see some silvery arm plates.

ExtraDescription.Description: They seem to be made from silver or platinum. You see the outline of a rose.

Item.Name: cloak white
Item.LongDescription: A white cloak lies on the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is a very fine made cloak from an unknown material, in a bright white color.

Item.Name: treasure coins
Item.LongDescription: A huge treasure is lying here, looking very valuable.

ExtraDescription.Description: Looks like a LOT of coins.

Item.Name: sword short
Item.LongDescription: There lies a short sword.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is a very nice little weapon.

Item.Name: backpack pack back
Item.LongDescription: A backpack stands upright here.

Item.Name: beltpouch pouch
Item.LongDescription: A large beltpouch lies here on the ground.

Item.Name: orb dragonorb
Item.LongDescription: A large reddish sphere is in the center of the room.

Item.Name: red torso
Item.LongDescription: There is a pile of red dragonscale on the floor.

Item.Name: leggings red
Item.LongDescription: On the floor you see two red dragonscale leggings.

Item.Name: claws dragonclaws red
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of red dragon claws
Item.LongDescription: You can see a pair of large red dragon claws on the floor.

Item.Name: skull dragonhelm red
Item.LongDescription: A helmet fashioned into the likeness of a dragon skull is here.

Item.Name: shield red
Item.LongDescription: A large red dragon shield rests on the floor.

Item.Name: greaves red
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of a red dragon's rear claws
Item.LongDescription: A pair of a red dragon's rear claws is on the floor.

Item.Name: arm guards red
Item.LongDescription: On the ground you see two red arm guards.
